name: GetAllHubdbTables
description:
Retrieve details of all published HubDB tables.

This tool returns the details and column definitions for all published HubDB tables in a HubSpot account. It is useful when you need an overview of the schema and data of all tables within your CMS environment.

parameters.name: sort_fields
parameters.description: Specify fields for sorting results: `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. Defaults to `createdAt`.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

parameters.name: cursor_token_for_next_results
parameters.description: The cursor token to retrieve the next set of results. Obtain this from the `paging.next.after` in a paged response.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: max_table_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of HubDB table results to return. Default is 1000.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 1000.

parameters.name: filter_by_creation_time
parameters.description: Return tables created at the specified time. Format: ISO 8601.

value_schema.description: Only return tables created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Return tables created after the specified time in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Only return tables created after the specified time.

parameters.name: created_before_timestamp
parameters.description: Return tables created before this timestamp. Format should be in ISO 8601.

value_schema.description: Only return tables created before the specified time.

parameters.name: last_updated_exact_time
parameters.description: Only return tables last updated at exactly the specified time, formatted as a string.

value_schema.description: Only return tables last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: updated_after_timestamp
parameters.description: Return tables last updated after this timestamp. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ'.

value_schema.description: Only return tables last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: updated_before_time
parameters.description: Return tables updated before this specific time.

value_schema.description: Only return tables last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: content_type_filter
parameters.description: Filter tables by the specified content type to return only those matching it.

parameters.name: include_archived_tables
parameters.description: Specifies whether to include archived tables in the results. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return archived tables. Defaults to `false`.

parameters.name: include_localized_schema
parameters.description: Include localized schema details in the response if true.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 1000.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 1000.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Only return tables created at exactly the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return tables created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Only return tables created after the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return tables created after the specified time.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Only return tables created before the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return tables created before the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: Only return tables last updated at exactly the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return tables last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedAfter
parameters.description: Only return tables last updated after the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return tables last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.description: Only return tables last updated before the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return tables last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return archived tables. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return archived tables. Defaults to `false`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
